meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intrusive.
meanings.sent1: Her intrusivenesses made it difficult for others to have privacy.
meanings.sent2: I was uncomfortable with the intrusivenesses of their questions.
meanings.sent3: The cat's intrusivenesses into my personal space was both annoying and endearing.
meanings.sent4: The intrusivenesses of the bright spotlight felt like an invasion of my senses.
meanings.sent5: The intrusivenesses of the loud music drowned out all other sounds.

meanings.definition: The tendency to intrude or impose oneself on others.
meanings.sent1: His constant intrusivenesses in our conversations made me feel suffocated.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her intrusivenesses in other people's affairs.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's intrusivenesses in the bird feeder provided endless entertainment for the family.
meanings.sent4: The intrusivenesses of the overbearing boss were like a dark cloud hanging over the office.
meanings.sent5: The intrusivenesses of the paparazzi were relentless, capturing every moment.
